name: In-die-cisive Investigations
description:
A murder mystery visual novel that took place over a game of D&D game.  One of the players has killed the DM!  You are the detective attempting to solve this case.   Roll the dice and try to find the murderer!  (Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022)

The detective (You) searches areas of the house to uncover information vital to cracking the case, with enough information and interrogations any mystery can be solved ;)

Keep in mind:

  • House rules dictate that members of the party are allowed three re-rolls per session.
  • If the game stops working after maxing out the re-rolls press the "escape" key.
  • After accusations the screen will be in a dim location, that's because we did not have enough time to implement a credits screen.

Made by: GoatOfGears, Reddy11104, Kirilbud, SpOokySkull, Tobi, and Koyuki.
